ygData.subject: RE: RE: Lookin fer fletchie kit in Grobb
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t be mad, cause it isn true. Hummies used to be able to get their kits at home not not anymore. In fact, when i got my fletchie kit was week I had to
ygData.messageBody:
> Me tankee yu fer da help. It make me reel mad dat hummies n dem kind ken
> get dere kits at home, but we trollies hafta go meny milez ta gets ours.

Don't be mad, cause it isn' true. Hummies used to be able to get their kits
at home not not anymore. In fact, when i got my fletchie kit was week I had
to walk to South Karana Plains myself. For whatever reason, last patch all
the vendors that used to sell kits and not arrows parts and suddenly sold
parts, no long sold fletchie kits!?

Good lucking fletching big fella.

Virten, Knight of Innoruuk
